## Edge.setEnds() method

Sets the origin &amp; dest vertices of this edge (in other words, the origins of this edge and `this.sym`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setEnds(o: T, d: T): void;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  o | <code>T</code> |  |
|  d | <code>T</code> |  |
